text: "Victims" is a 1983 song by English new wave band Culture Club. It was taken from their second studio album Colour by Numbers. It went to number 3 in the United Kingdom, number 4 in Australia, number 11 in Belgium, number 7 in New Zealand and number 2 in Ireland and Italy. It was not released in North America, South America and Japan. ==References== Category:1983 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Culture Club songs
title: Victims (song)
